#summary Short description of the SyncML protocol.
#labels SyncML,Protocal

SyncML (Synchronized Markup Langauge) is an XML-based standard for synchronizing data like contacts, calendar entries, personal notes via networks between different personal devices of a user.

_ChBoSync_ is a client for _SyncML_.


Links for further information on SyncML:
 * Chapter in wikibook _"ML - Managing Data Exchange"_ on SyncML: _[http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/XML_-_Managing_Data_Exchange/SyncML here]_.
